name: Security Engineer
description:
We are looking for a self-sufficient Security Engineer who is willing to bring the best security approaches to the company and protect it from various security threats. You will be working in a team of experienced system and network engineers who will be glad to assist you to implement your ideas and share knowledge.

Responsibilities:

  • Scan network/software for privacy and security breaches and threats;
  • Monitor information about new vulnerabilities and security breaches and raise requests to fix these and control that these are timely fixed;
  • Provide recommendations to bring the best security approaches to the company;
  • Research and implement security software to detect intrusions/anomalies;
  • Manage endpoint security software (Microsoft Intune, ESET Endpoint protection);
  • Regularly audit servers and network security, system accesses, and user's permissions;
  • Do a second pair of eye security checks during the onboarding/offboarding process;
  • Schedule and control security training for employees using our dedicated software.

Requirements:

  • 3+ years of experience in the same or similar position;
  • Knowledge of IT security standards and frameworks;
  • Understanding of Cloud security concepts;
  • Experience with O365, Azure, AWS;
  • Knowledge and experience of working with security analyzers, tools, and frameworks;
  • Fluent written and spoken English (B1+).

These are Just Some of Our Benefits

  • Competitive market salary, reviewed once a year;
  • Professional trainings and conferences, with the partial/full compensation;
  • Medical insurance (depends on location).

About us:

Finstek is an industry leading Fintech technology provider delivering secure and scalable solutions designed to power intricate ﬁnancial applications. Founded in 2010, Finstek has developed a set of advanced technological products over the years, with proven track record within the ﬁntech industry. The solutions have become popular and trusted worldwide, being used by top ﬁnancial institutions. Finstek is committed to provide innovative and reliable solutions based on its robust technologies, infrastructure, and expertise.
